reviews.review_msg: Very knowledgeable and brought real world, local examples to apply the theory to. Great experience in her class: understands there is life outside the SFU bubble and really prepares you for working after post-secondary

Darcie is an amazing professor and by far the best professor I have had to date at SFU. She let us do anything we wanted for the final project instead of a paper! We were allowed to be creative and classes were fun and interesting. It did not even feel like a 4 hour lecture because of all the interesting discussion topics, videos and questions.
